problem:
r1=random.randrange(1,10,1) r2=random.randrange(1,10,1) total=r1+r2 div=float(r2)/(r1+r2)
Take a resistor network with \(R_1=$r1\Omega\) and \(R_2=$r2\Omega\):
Assuming the output is disconnected, what is the resistance seen at the input?
What is the voltage divider gain if voltage is applied to \(R_1\), and \(R_2\) is grounded?
